This is it, you are backstage at Justin Bieber's concert. Five minutes ago you had been watching him perform and now you were backstage. You looked around in wonder, thinking that at any moment you might see the pop sensation. You turn a corner and see it straight away, his changing room. You find it strange that there is nobody outside it but go straight over and knock on the door.

"Come in," says the familiar voice on the other side. You put your hand to the handle and slowly push the door open. He comes into view and your heart skips a beat, it's really him. He smiles at you. "You must be Kyle," he said, "close the door." You do as he say and walk over towards where he is sitting shirtless, wiping sweat away with a towel. He picks up a pitcher of water sitting on the table next to him and fills a glass. He then hands this to you. With shaking hands you take the glass and take a sip. His smiles spreads into a mischievous grin as you begin to feel dizzy. You go to hold onto the table but your hand slips and you fall to the floor.

"We're gonna have a lot of fun," he says before you lose consciousness.

[7:57 am] Finally, you think. You start sucking his toes, the flavour stronger than the sweat on his soles, almost causing you to gag. You start massaging his other foot with both hands.

After two minutes, Justin wakes up, on a strange sensation on his feet. He opens his eyes and sees you, miserably on the floor, sucking his toes and massaging his feet. He smiles and lets you continue. After another 15 minutes, he removes his feet from you.

"Well, first of all, you need to....."
14322111112.title: Bieber's training

143221111121.content:
"Well, first of all, come here and lick these pits clean." He commands, yawning.

You crawl tiredly towards his exposed pits, but after a few meters you get stopped in your tracks, the fixed leash preventing you from moving.

You stare at Justin submissively, knowing that you couldn't talk without permission.

He stares at you with an confused look, but quickly realizes what you're trying to tell him.

"Oh! Ofcourse, my little foot-licker's restrictions prevents him from licking his Masters delicious pits. You're allowed to untie the leash, slave."

You crawl back to one of the poles and untie the leash. You crawl back to Justin, and kneel at the side of the bed.

Justin ignores you for a few minutes, playing on his phone, while you suffer silently, the smell of his pits wafting in your nose.

He stands up and stretches, his package being slammed in your face. He looks down at you and snickers.

"Good morning little footboy, go ahead and kiss my feet good morning."

You comply, getting down and kissing each toe."Goodmorning Master." You say with a dry throat.

He continues.
"These pits need to be cleaned real quick, and since it's your first time, I'll guide you."

He grabs you by the throat, forcing you to stand up.
Even standing up, you feel inferior. Not only are you 4 inches shorter than him, but his muscle mass is incomparable to you. You look like a stick compared to him.

Without saying anything, he grabs the back of your head and slams your face into his left armpit.

The smell is awful. It's completely different from his feet-smell, alot more concentrated sweat. With that, the musty warm aroma is making you sick. After the first lick, you gag, wanting to back off, but Justin's firm grip prevents you from doing that.

You take another lick, and the same happens again, but you don't fall back, afraid of your Master's reaction. The taste is 10× more salty than his footsweat, making it hard to swallow.

After a few licks, you begin adjusting to the taste and you try to find a pace.

When you think you have a steady pace, Justin suddenly pulls on your hair. Not knowing what to do, you start licking faster.

This hair-pulling doesn't stop and he pulls your hair harder by the second. You start to desperately slobber like a dog, getting every inch of his pit, not caring about the taste.

After 40 seconds, he stops. He removes your face from his pit.

Not for long though, when you try to take a breath, Justin slams your face in his other moist pit.

This time you immediately start licking like a dog, again, not caring about the burning liquid entering your stomach.

He doesn't pull on your hair this time and removes his pit from your face after 30 seconds.


You suddenly become disoriented and dizzy after this and you pass out.

You wake up...
143221111121.title: Into the pitcave

1432211111211.content:
You open your eyes, looking up at some kind of ceiling. You try to get up, but fail miserably. You're stuck in some kind of box. Only your head is exposed out of a hole, and it seems that your head seems to perfectly fit in the hole, leaving no space to move your head.

"Sir, he opened his eyes and seems to be awake." An unfamiliar voice says, the voice reminding you of a typical butler.

Not even getting the chance to finish this thought, the box begins to move forward.

It stops after a few seconds of moving, and two pair of feet meet your eyes, slowly coming down and covering your face.

All you see is darkness. This reminds you of the pit-smothering torture that took place when Justin woke up. You immediately recognize the smell from his feet as Justin's.

You stick your tongue out and he starts gliding his feet over your tongue. You haven't recovered from the night of terror, so your tongue is still as dry as sandpaper. But you don't mind as much, the taste of his sweat is familiar to you.

After 10 minutes of licking, he removes his feet. You swallow all the sweat, your stomach hardly handling all the gunk and sweat.

You think that the torture is over, but the box start moving again, to the other side.

It stops, and another pair of feet slowly covering on your face. These feet are bigger and the smell is different, rather cheesy than vinegary, like Justin's. You begin coughing audibly, and the man and Justin start laughing at your suffering. His foot sweat is getting stuck on your face, with some suckling and fluff mixed in.

He taps on your cheek, probably signaling to stick your tongue out. You do, and like Justin, his feet glide over your tongue over and over again. The sweat tastes less salty than Justin’s, but the taste is stronger. His skin feels rougher than Justin’s, suggesting that this man is older.

He continues doing this for 20 minutes.

After this, he lets you suck his toes. The flavor of his toes is more concentrated and cheesy, causing you to gag. His toes are also bigger, so cleaning all his toes is going to take longer. He finally removes his feet from your face, after 10 minutes, finally letting you sniff in some fresh air.

The box immediately starts moving again, out of the table. The light blinds you for a moment.

You see two men standing above you, shirtless and glistening with sweat. One is Justin. And you recognize the other man as his manager: Scooter Braun, who looks like he just finished working out, which explains the humongous amount of sweat and toe-jam from his feet and toes.

"So this is him huh? Scooter says, grinning.

"Yeah, I got him yesterday, what'cha think?" Justin says.

"I enjoyed his tongue, it felt rough... but I find it astounding that he survived my feet! Even worse, yours! I don't want to be near you after a concert, I can't imagine how it was for him." He laughs.

"He hasn't eaten or drank anything since yesterday. All he's had is my foot and armpit sweat! And now yours hahaha." Justin says.

Scooter looks flabbergasted at you, but doesn't look away when it appears that he notices something about you.

While Justin tells him about the torture he's put you through, like when he forced you to suck out his socks, Scooter doesn't look away.

Justin notices this after a while.

"Scooter? Why are you staring at the slave like that?" He says, confused.

It's silent for a moment.

"He reminds me of someone, are you known or something?"

14322111112111.content:
They curiously at you, awaiting your answer.

"Who?" Justin cuts you off. "What's your full name? "

"Kyle Hemsworth." You quietly say.

"Hemsworth!? You're related to the Hemsworth brothers!?" Scooter exclaims.

You nod, or at least try to nod.

They both appear speechless, not moving a muscle for a few seconds, staring at you.

Justin breaks the silence. He walks forward, kneels down, and unlocks the box you are in.

You wriggle out of the box and sit on your knees, looking up at the muscular jocks.

"Stand." Justin command.

You stand up. Scooter is
buffer than Justin, so you feel even thinner than before.

They both start laughing.

Before you can answer, Justin speaks.

There's a moment of silence.

"Here's his wiki-page, look." Justin says to Scooter. "It's almost completely empty. It only mentions the things he's done with Chris and Liam.

You look at them awkwardly, not knowing what to say or do.

"Look at his accomplishments, there's almost nothing here!" Scooter bursts out, laughing.

"We should add "Has licked and kissed Justin Bieber's feet!" and "Has sucked and licked Scooter Brauns feet clean." Justin yells.

They both continue laughing and joking about your achievements, while you awkwardly stand still, looking up at them.

"Don't worry, I have a plan, and don't worry Kyle, you'll eventually be his slave permanently." Scooter says.

You're crushed, secretly happy that they were concerned about you being part of a celebrity-family.

They walk away, Scooter explaining the plan, but you can't hear them. You only hear them saying that they're going to play games.

"Clean the table and wait on your knees by the table." Justin commands.

When they reach the door, Scooter picks up his socks and throws in your face.

You do, cleaning the table. You finish and get on your knees and start sucking the socks clean. You gag instantly, the cheesy salty sweat killing you from the inside. But you pull through, knowing that the torture isn't going to stop.

If you say yes, a miserably life is awaiting you. Only Scooter knows now and you know that you're going to clean his feet also if he visits, meaning that you aren't going to be the slave of only Justin. Who knows who'll know and use you as a footcleaner in the future.


You think for a bit, realizing that Scooter raised his foot in the air, inches from your nose, wiggling his toes, his cheesy smell wafting into your nostrils. "Come on, you want to be at these feet right." Scooter says.

He stands up, puts his shirt on and hugs Justin goodbye. "I'll see you tomorrow."

They chat a little bit and he walks towards the door. He opens it and before he closes it, he says; "Hey boy, I'll have some freshly sweaty feet for you tomorrow slave boy." Scooter smiles.

Justin picks up your leash and puts it on you. He walks towards the couch and sit on it, with you kneeling before him. "I already knew that you being away would cause worry in your family. But now that I know that you're semi-famous, I've got to take a different approach."He says.

Justin notices this. "What? Is there a problem? You've got permission to speak."

You look horrible, so what you're gonna do when they start to ask questions, you'll say that you have been feeling depressed and that I picked you up to hang out and make you feel better." You whimper and nod yes, which puts a smile on his face.

He removes his hands from your leash, and puts his feet on your back. "Don't think that just because of your little vacation in two weeks, that you can slack off now. You'll always be my slave, remember that. Now, stay in this position so I can relax." He says.
1432211111211111.title: D-List footslave

14322111112111111.content:

He would have something for you to do, even when he wasn't home. He would provide you with his socks to suck clean, not only that, but Scooter would come by every day to add his socks to the collection.

Aside from being a wash machine, you obviously licked his feet clean every day. And now, here you are, ready to leave, to freedom. Justin has given you new clothes and you showered with normal water. Normally, you would let socks soak in buckets of water to clean yourself.

Liam lifts his foot too, slightly slapping your cheek with his foot, the sweat and lint getting stuck on your cheek."You've done a good job little bro, we're going to have you do this more." He laughs, the tone in his voice with a little authority on the second part.

They remove their feet and stand up, walking upstairs. You follow them upstairs, going into a room with one king-sized bed. You are confused, the reason being why there's only one bed.

"Uhm, where are the other beds?" You exclaim confused.

You continue arguing for a while and they eventually break you. You join them in bed and submit yourself and lie down on the opposite side.

info.brief_description: One man is about to become the slave of a pop sensation.
info.description:
The story centers around Kyle, a 23 year old man who is a huge fan of Justin Bieber's. Kyle has fairly short hair, blue eyes and tanned skin. He is 165cm and slim. He does not wear glasses and has small childish facial features.

Other people can be introduced into the story as long as the story follows Kyle. Please avoid killing off characters and try to keep the story going.
